processingCommand.script:
if "${NextTaskToRun}"=="" GOTO COMPLETED
:PROCESS
Echo Kill any running executables started by ${NextTaskToRun} 
REM "${UXEXE}\uxend" CTL TSK=${NextTaskToRun} UPR=* MU=${S_CODUG}
REM Ignore 'No Articles extracted' as an error
set resexe=0
ECHO Provoke ${NextTaskToRun} as the next task down the chain
REM "${UXEXE}\uxordre" TSK=${NextTaskToRun} MU=${S_CODUG} ELAPS="02359"
GOTO END
:COMPLETED
Echo No next task to run
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
